id.description: NanoID of the thread, uniquely identifies the thread.

topicId.description: NanoID of the topic this thread belongs to.

type.description: Defines the inquiry focus of the thread.

focus.description: Optional freeform text providing additional focus or nuance for the thread.

status.description: Current lifecycle status of the thread.

duration.description: Estimated intended duration for handling this thread, in seconds.

actualDuration.description: Actual recorded duration spent on this thread, in seconds.

relatedThreads.description: IDs of threads related to this one for cross-context purposes.

contextObject.description: Optional structured context data to enhance thread prompting.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when this thread was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when this thread was last modified.
